cards.rules_text: A deck can have any number of cards named Inkwell.

A deck can have any number of cards named Comedy Mask.
At the end of your turn, destroy Comedy Mask and create a Tragedy Mask token.

A deck can have any number of cards named Tragedy Mask.
At the end of your turn, destroy Tragedy Mask and create a Comedy Mask token.

A deck can have any number of cards named Comedy Mask.
At the end of your turn, destroy Comedy Mask and create a Tragedy Mask token.

A deck can have any number of cards named Tragedy Mask.
At the end of your turn, destroy Tragedy Mask and create a Comedy Mask token.

Transcend Ability: 2 Ink: Put a Transcendence counter on Venumar.
Attack Ability: 3 Ink: Venumar deals 2 damage to target attackable creation. Then if that creation has no Transcendence counters on it, Venumar deals 1 more damage to it.
Transcend Ability: 2 Ink: Put a Transcendence counter on Inkeye. Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom of your deck.

Transcend Ability: 1 Comedy: Put a Transcendence counter on Puppetear. Trigger the end of turn ability of a Comedy attached to Puppetear.
Transcend Ability: 3 Comedy: Put two Transcendence counters on Puppetear.
Attack Ability: 1 Tragedy: Puppetear deals 1 damage to target attackable creation. Trigger the end of turn ability of a Comedy attached to Puppetear.
Attack Ability: 3 Tragedy: Puppetear deals 3 damage to target attackable creation.

Transcend Ability: 2 Ink: Put two Transcendence counters on Protagonor.
Attack Ability: 2 Ink: Protagonor deals 1 damage to target attackable creation.

Transcend Ability: 2 Ink: Put a Transcendence counter on Antagonor.
Attack Ability: 2 Ink: Antagonor deals 2 damage to target attackable creation.

If another creation you control would deal damage to a creation, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.
Transcend Ability: 2 Ink: Put a Transcendence counter on Roosterror.
Attack Ability: 2 Ink: Roosterror deals 1 damage to target attackable creation.
Draw two cards.

As a cost to play this card, discard three cards and destroy a creation you control.
Search your deck for any number of Inkwell cards, put them into your play zone, then shuffle. They can't be attached this turn.

As a cost to play this card, destroy a medium card you control.
Draw three cards.

As a cost to play this card, destroy two creation cards you control.
Draw three cards.
Put a transcendence counter on target creation you control. It can't fully transcend from counters put on it this turn. [i](They still count towards full transcendence later.)[/i]

Draw a card.
This turn, if a creation leaves a play zone, destroy all mediums that were attached to it.
Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

As a cost to play this card, discard a card.
Search your deck for up to two Medium cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand.
Destroy two target Mediums.

Transcend Ability: 1 Ink: As a cost to activate this ability, destroy any number of mediums attached to Consumtoad. Put a Transcendence counter on Consumtoad for every second medium destroyed this way.
Attack Ability: 2 Ink: Consumtoad deals 1 damage to target attackable creation.
